summary: An email from an FBI Special Agent to Maureen Townsel providing additional identifiers (phone numbers, email addresses, and partial credit card information) for Ghislaine Maxwell and Ghislaine Borgerson in relation to an Amazon subpoena for case CRIM1048721. The document is marked as privileged and confidential.

persons.name: Maureen Townsel
persons.context: Addressee of an email from an FBI Special Agent regarding an Amazon subpoena for identifiers related to Ghislaine Maxwell and Ghislaine Borgerson.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Individual for whom additional identifiers (phones, email, Amazon transactions) are being provided to support an Amazon subpoena in case CRIM1048721.

persons.name: Ghislaine Borgerson
persons.context: Individual for whom additional identifiers (phones, email, Amazon transactions) are being provided alongside Ghislaine Maxwell for an Amazon subpoena.

connections.description: Both are subjects of the same Amazon subpoena investigation, with identifiers being collected for them together.
The FBI agent is providing investigative data (identifiers) on Ghislaine Maxwell for a legal subpoena.
The FBI agent is providing investigative data (identifiers) on Ghislaine Borgerson for a legal subpoena.
The FBI agent is communicating with Maureen Townsel to provide additional identifiers for the Amazon subpoena.

events.title: FBI Provides Additional Identifiers for Amazon Subpoena
events.description: An FBI Special Agent emails Maureen Townsel with additional identifiers (phones, email, partial credit card info) for Ghislaine Maxwell and Ghislaine Borgerson related to Amazon subpoena CRIM1048721.

keyFacts: The FBI was actively investigating Ghislaine Maxwell and Ghislaine Borgerson as of January 2020, seeking their identifiers for an Amazon subpoena.
Investigators had obtained partial credit card information (first four and last four digits) for transactions, indicating financial records were being examined.
The communication is marked 'Privileged and Confidential,' highlighting the sensitive nature of the ongoing investigation.
The case reference CRIM1048721 suggests this was part of a specific criminal investigation, likely related to child exploitation or human trafficking given the FBI unit involved.
